alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 10:35AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Roseau River at Roseau affecting Roseau County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Sand Hill River at Climax affecting Polk County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.5 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
